name: Wang Weiliang
description: '''Wang Weiliang''' (born 11 October 1987) is a [[Singaporeans|Singaporean]] comedian, host, actor, singer and businessman. A [[getai]] performer-turned-actor, Wang grew prominence with the box-office successes of the ''[[Ah Boys to Men (film series)|Ah Boys to Men]]'' film series by director [[Jack Neo]].
